Name: The Great Adventures of Hemeko & CH0_CH0
About the game: Hello, we're Nose Studio! For the past year, we've been doing a lot of activities including animation production, music release, and exhibition with 'Hemeco and Chocho' characters. We've been trying to release games for a long time to prove that our characters are more than just pictures and have vitality. Our goal is to continue to expand our worldview even after the release of the game and build a virtual world where we can imagine everything. Please enjoy it! [About this game] I am wandering through Hemeko, Cho_cho, and P-hole through which I travel through the endless universe using P-hole, and I am seeing and feeling a lot of things. Where else will I start my adventure this time? When I came to my senses through an unintentional P-hole with one accidental incident, I was in a house that was similar to Earth but felt something strange! To go on another adventure, we need to gather polygons with the power to open P holes. Can we find all the polygons in this strange place? You should use various obstacles properly and find hidden polygons using buttons and switches. Also, make sure to use the hints all over the stage! Please open up a new world by becoming a Hemeko and a Cho_cho for yourself! [Basic Challenges] Gather the 20 polygon pieces hidden in the stage and open the P hole! [Additional Challenges] Find hidden Easter Eggs in the game. (Save a record of the player you have completed by registering a Steam Quest) [How to play] Move: WASD Jump: Space bar Crouch: Ctrl Action: Mouse Left Click Pause: Enter
